faqs.question: What is Zyros?
faqs.answer: Zyros is a modern static site generator that allows you to create beautiful, fast websites using just JSON configuration. No coding required!

faqs.question: How do I get started?
faqs.answer: Simply install Zyros via npm, create a site.json file with your content, and run the build command. Your website will be generated automatically.

faqs.question: Can I customize the design?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Zyros comes with 8 built-in themes, and you can customize colors, layouts, and components through the JSON configuration.

faqs.question: Is it SEO-friendly?
faqs.answer: Yes! All sites generated with Zyros are optimized for search engines with proper meta tags, structured data, and fast loading times.

faqs.question: Can I add custom functionality?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can extend Zyros with custom components, forms, content blocks, and integrations through the flexible plugin system.

pages.title: Getting Started with Zyros
pages.description: Learn how to build beautiful static sites with just a JSON file and zero configuration.
pages.content:
# Getting Started with Zyros

Welcome to the future of static site generation! **Zyros** transforms your simple JSON configuration into a beautiful, fast, and SEO-optimized website.

## Why Zyros?

Building websites shouldn't be complicated. With Zyros, you get:

- ‚ö° **Lightning Fast** - Static generation means instant loading
- üìù **JSON-Driven** - Manage content with simple JSON files
- üé® **Beautiful Themes** - Multiple built-in themes to choose from
- üì± **Mobile First** - Responsive design out of the box
- üîç **SEO Ready** - Optimized for search engines

## New Advanced Features

### Content Blocks

Create rich, interactive sections using pre-built content blocks. Simply define them in your JSON configuration and reference them in your pages.

### Form Builder

Create complex forms with validation, multiple field types, and custom styling. All configured through JSON.

### Enhanced Navigation

Create sophisticated navigation with mega menus, icons, badges, and nested structures.

## Multiple Themes

Choose from eight carefully crafted themes:

1. **Light** - Clean and minimal
2. **Dark** - Modern and sleek
3. **Minimal** - Elegant simplicity
4. **Ocean** - Cool and refreshing
5. **Sunset** - Warm and vibrant
6. **Forest** - Natural and calming
7. **Midnight** - Deep and mysterious
8. **Neon** - Bold and electric

---

*Ready to build something amazing? Let's get started!*

pages.title: Advanced Features & Customization
pages.description: Explore the advanced capabilities of Zyros and learn how to customize your site.
pages.content:
# Advanced Features & Customization

Once you've mastered the basics, Zyros SSG offers powerful features for creating truly unique websites.

## Content Blocks System

The content blocks system allows you to create rich, interactive sections without writing code:

### Available Block Types

- **Hero** - Eye-catching header sections with CTAs
- **Features** - Showcase your product features
- **Testimonials** - Social proof from customers
- **Stats** - Display impressive numbers
- **CTA** - Call-to-action sections
- **Contact** - Contact information and forms

## Form Builder

Create sophisticated forms with validation, file uploads, and custom styling:

### Field Types

- **Text** - Single line text input
- **Email** - Email validation
- **Textarea** - Multi-line text
- **Select** - Dropdown selection
- **Checkbox** - Multiple selections
- **Radio** - Single selection
- **File** - File uploads

## Custom Layouts

Choose from multiple layout types:

- **Default** - Standard blog layout
- **Full-width** - Edge-to-edge content
- **Sidebar** - Content with sidebar
- **Minimal** - Clean, distraction-free
- **Landing** - Optimized for conversions

---

*The possibilities are endless. What will you build next?*

pages.title: About This Project
pages.description: Learn about the philosophy and technology behind Zyros SSG.
pages.content:
# About This Project

**Zyros SSG** was born from a simple idea: building websites should be as easy as writing JSON.

## The Philosophy

In a world of complex build tools, endless configuration files, and framework fatigue, we believe in:

### Simplicity First
- One JSON file to rule them all
- Zero configuration required
- Sensible defaults everywhere

### Performance by Default
- Static generation for speed
- Optimized assets out of the box
- Lighthouse scores of 100

## New Advanced Features

### Content Blocks System
Pre-built, customizable sections that you can mix and match:
- Hero sections
- Feature lists
- Testimonials
- Statistics
- Call-to-action blocks
- Contact sections

### Form Builder
Create complex forms with:
- Multiple field types
- Validation rules
- File uploads
- Custom styling
- Success messages

### Enhanced Navigation
- Mega menus
- Icons and badges
- Nested structures
- Custom CTAs

---

*Built with ‚ù§Ô∏è for developers who value simplicity and performance.*

pages.title: Contact & Demo Forms
pages.description: Get in touch with us and see our advanced form builder in action.
pages.content:
# Contact & Demo Forms

Welcome to our contact page! Here you can see our advanced form builder in action and get in touch with our team.

## Advanced Form Features

Our form builder supports:

### Field Types
- **Text inputs** with validation
- **Email fields** with format checking
- **Dropdown selects** with custom options
- **Checkboxes** for multiple selections
- **Radio buttons** for single selections
- **File uploads** with drag & drop
- **Textarea** for longer messages

### Validation Rules
- Required field validation
- Minimum/maximum length
- Custom regex patterns
- Email format validation
- Real-time error messages

## Get in Touch

Have questions about **Zyros SSG**? Want to collaborate on a project? We'd love to hear from you!

### Ways to Connect

- üìß **Email**: hello@zyros.dev
- üíº **LinkedIn**: Connect with our team
- üêô **GitHub**: Check out our code
- üê¶ **Twitter**: Follow for updates

---

*Looking forward to connecting with you! üöÄ*

pages.title: Showcase Gallery
pages.description: Explore our portfolio of beautiful websites and projects created with Zyros SSG.
pages.content:
# Project Showcase

Discover the amazing websites and applications built with **Zyros SSG**. From simple blogs to complex e-commerce platforms, see what's possible with our powerful static site generator.

## Why Choose Zyros SSG?

Our platform empowers developers and designers to create stunning websites without the complexity of traditional development workflows.

### Key Benefits

- **Lightning Fast** - Static generation means instant loading
- **SEO Optimized** - Built-in SEO best practices
- **Mobile First** - Responsive design out of the box
- **Developer Friendly** - Simple JSON configuration
- **Highly Customizable** - Flexible theming system

---

*Ready to build something amazing? [Get started today](/getting-started)!*

pages.title: Our Team
pages.description: Meet the passionate team behind Zyros SSG and learn about our mission to make web development accessible.
pages.content:
# Meet Our Team

Behind every great product is a passionate team of individuals working together to make a difference. At **Zyros SSG**, we're united by our mission to democratize web development and make it accessible to everyone.

## Our Mission

We believe that creating beautiful, fast websites shouldn't require years of coding experience or complex build processes. Our goal is to empower creators, entrepreneurs, and developers with tools that are both powerful and simple to use.

## Our Values

### Simplicity First
We prioritize ease of use without sacrificing functionality. Every feature we build is designed with the user experience in mind.

### Open Source
We believe in the power of community and open source development. Our tools are built transparently and with community input.

### Performance
Speed and performance are not optional. Every site generated with Zyros SSG is optimized for the fastest possible loading times.

### Innovation
We're constantly exploring new technologies and approaches to make web development better for everyone.

---

*Want to join our team? Check out our [careers page](/careers) for open positions.*

pages.title: Pricing & Plans
pages.description: Choose the perfect plan for your needs. Start free and scale as you grow with transparent, affordable pricing.
pages.content:
# Simple, Transparent Pricing

At **Zyros SSG**, we believe in fair, transparent pricing that grows with your needs. Whether you're just starting out or running a large organization, we have a plan that's right for you.

## Why Our Pricing Works

### No Hidden Fees
What you see is what you pay. No surprise charges, no hidden costs.

### Cancel Anytime
All our paid plans can be cancelled at any time with no penalties.

### 30-Day Money Back
Not satisfied? Get a full refund within 30 days, no questions asked.

### Volume Discounts
Need multiple licenses? Contact us for custom enterprise pricing.

## Frequently Asked Questions

### Can I change plans later?
Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

### What payment methods do you accept?
We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for enterprise customers.

### Do you offer student discounts?
Yes! Students and educators get 50% off all paid plans. Contact us with your .edu email address.

### Is there a free trial?
Our Free plan is available forever with no time limits. Pro and Enterprise plans include a 14-day free trial.

---

*Ready to get started? [Sign up now](/signup) or [contact our sales team](/contact) for enterprise solutions.*
